titles.title: To amend the Act establishing the Women's Rights National Historical Park to permit the Secretary of the Interior to acquire title in fee simple to the Hunt House located in Waterloo, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 10/28/1999--Introduced. Amends Federal law establishing the Women's Rights National Historic Park in Seneca Falls and Waterloo, New York, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire for Park purposes the Hunt House in Waterloo.
